mapper.select:
select
from t_swap_house where area_id = #{areaId} and ifnull(adjudication_json, '') <> '' order by id desc limit 0,1

mapper.select: select distinct a.address, b.house_owner as houseOwner, b.new_house_address as newHouseAddress, b.seat, b.unit, b.floors, b.house_number as houseNumber from t_settle_accounts a inner join t_swap_house b where a.address = b.address and a.deleted = 0 and b.deleted = 0 and a.id = #{settleId}

select
from t_swap_house where deleted = 0
and area_id in
#{itemId}
